Translation.String: Show more information data in game bottom panel.
Repeat to click for toggle Radio 'Enable or Disable'
Repeat to click for 'Enable or Disable' Mute Audio
Repeat to click for 'Open or Close' Chirper icon.

There are 6 levels of speed changing which combine from 'More Simulation Speed Options' mod.
Speed Level: x1, x2, x4, x6, x9, x99
'A Day' 24 hours simulation time of In-Game. This time can be changed by other mods anytime. Repeat to click for 'Enable or Disable' display this time.
The 24 hours of real world, it's earth time of your location. Repeat to click for switch 'Real World Time' and 'Played In-Game Time'.

There are 7 colored dispaly mode for temperature.
Red for 'Flame Furnace' Orange for 'The Heat is Unbearable' Yellow for 'Heat Wave' Green for 'Livable Paradise' Light Green for 'Autumn end Winter come' Light Blue for 'In the Biting Cold Wind' Blue for 'Frozen Purgatory'
